p: Hearts & Science has been inspired by confident marketers seeking business advantage in a world of personalized digital marketing, where CRM and addressable channels converge, and decisions must be made in real-time to aggregate effective reach and deliver the right message at the right time.

p.4: As a Data Scientist with Hearts & Science you must have strong quantitative background and experience working in AdTech and MarTech domains.
